subtitle: In society we generally rely on modern science to tell us the ultimate reality of things right
and you know for good reason because science deals with facts and that's what we want right
the problem comes when we rely too much on external means of science and
when we ignore the science of the heart the science of consciousness and so you know you never
really know anything directly through relying on modern science you never have gnosis about
things and direct experience and understanding of it and so you know for example imagine if uh
science suddenly discovered that astral projection was real that would never prove
anything to you directly and so we have to stop relying on modern science to tell us
things and instead become our own pioneers of consciousness and find out things for ourselves
